item.title: By: Michael Medley
item.dc:creator: Michael Medley
item.description: The photo is in fact from the famous victory of 4th-Division Colchester United over top-of-the-league Leeds United in the 1971 FA Cup. Leeds were famous for patient build-ups. But often the weakness of a sophisticated system is its unadaptability. Colchester, the written-off underdogs, seem to have clattered it with a direct approach. You need a lucky day, but that may be your best hope.
item.content:encoded: The photo is in fact from the famous victory of 4th-Division Colchester United over top-of-the-league Leeds United in the 1971 FA Cup. Leeds were famous for patient build-ups. But often the weakness of a sophisticated system is its unadaptability. Colchester, the written-off underdogs, seem to have clattered it with a direct approach. You need a lucky day, but that may be your best hope.
